Esquites with Frozen Corn


Ingredients
3 tablespoons unsalted butter
1 (2 pound) bag corn kernels, thawed and drained
1/4 cup lime juice
1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder
1/4 cup mayonnaise
1/4 cup cotija cheese
2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, or to taste
lime wedges (optional)

Cooking Instructions

Melt butter in a soup pot over medium-high heat, and cook
corn until hot, about 8 minutes. Stir in lime juice and
chili powder; cook until lime juice is nearly evaporated,
about 2 minutes. Fold in mayonnaise and cook 2 minutes more.
Turn off heat. Spoon into serving cups and top with cotija
and cilantro. Serve with lime wedges.
